attributes.action: Raise the speed limit at the M74 , M73 and M8 back to the original 70mph.
attributes.background: These roads were originally 70mph areas. The time it took to get to town was originally about 20minutes. Now that the speed limit has been decreased we are talking around the 45-50 minute mark depending on traffic conditions. I feel if we increase the limit there won't be as much traffic congestion.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
